member.name: T:PeerReview.ATM.HardwareDrivers.CashDispenser_MoneyRain2017.CashDispenserMoneyRain2017Driver

A hardware driver to the cash dispenser device of the ATM
[DEV INFO] There is 600 initial balance in the ATM.

member.name: P:PeerReview.ATM.HardwareDrivers.CashDispenser_MoneyRain2017.CashDispenserMoneyRain2017Driver.AvailableAmount
member.summary: Gets the available amount of cash in the ATM

member.name: M:PeerReview.ATM.HardwareDrivers.CashDispenser_MoneyRain2017.CashDispenserMoneyRain2017Driver.Dispense(System.Int32)
member.param: The amount of cash to be dispensed. Must be a positive numbr.
member.exception: If is less or equal to 0.
